page.title: 05SHEEPRIDGE FARM
page.content: {Sheepridge Farm}is 151 acres or 61 hectares of mainly Arable land. {Mr.Meakin}keeps steers for beef for 18 months by buying calves in the winter and keeping them until they are big enough to sell.They are mainly fed on food grown on the farm.He has 55 calves which are 8 months old.They are male {Friesian and Hereford Cross.}He is hoping to buy 60 calves in September. This year he planted 24 hectares of {Winter Barley},8 hectares of{Spring {Barley}and 7 hectares of{Winter Wheat. There are 19 hectares of grassland and 1.2 hectares of{Lupins.}The lupins are an experiment.They will be fed to the steers.If they like them he may grow more. {Mr.Meakin}runs the farm by himself and only has other people in to help with the harvest.
